At that time, SubhÅ«ti again replied to ÅšÄriputra, saying:
As the Venerable One said, 'Why is it said that the bodhisattva-mahÄsattva is only a provisional name?'
ÅšÄriputra!
The name 'bodhisattva-mahÄsattva' is only provisionally designated.
At that time, ÅšÄriputra asked SubhÅ«ti, saying:
For what reason is it said that the name of a bodhisattva-mahÄsattva is only a guest that is included?
SubhÅ«ti replied:

Just as the names of all dharmas are only guests that are included, they do not come from the ten directions or the three periods of time, nor do they go anywhere or abide anywhere. Among all dharmas there are no names, and among names there are no all dharmas. They are neither combined nor separate, but are only provisionally established.
Why is this?
Because all dharmas and names are empty of inherent nature. In the emptiness of inherent nature, neither all dharmas nor names exist, nor can they be obtained.

The name of a bodhisattva-mahÄsattva is also like this, only a guest that is included. It does not come from the ten directions or the three periods of time, nor does it go anywhere or abide anywhere. Among bodhisattva-mahÄsattvas there are no names, and among names there are no bodhisattva-mahÄsattvas. They are neither combined nor separate, but are only provisionally established.
Why is this?
Because the bodhisattva-mahÄsattva and the name are both empty of intrinsic nature, in the emptiness of intrinsic nature, neither the bodhisattva-mahÄsattva nor the name exist and cannot be found.
ÅšÄriputra!
For this reason I say:
The bodhisattva-mahÄsattva is only a provisional name.
ÅšÄriputra!

Just as the name of form is only provisionally designated, it does not come from the ten directions or the three periods of time, and it does not go anywhere or remain anywhere. Form is without name, and name is without form. It is neither combined nor separate, but only provisionally established.
Why is this?
Because form and name are both empty of intrinsic nature, in the emptiness of intrinsic nature, neither form nor name exist and cannot be found.
